pageContext.claim: “Last year, the [EPA] completed more Superfund hazardous waste clean-ups than any year of the previous administrations and set records in almost every year.”
pageContext.analysis: The EPA deleted the largest number of Superfund sites from the list, but that’s not the same as monitoring clean up. {The Associated Press reported,} “Some state officials privately noted that the EPA, at least so far, has been deleting low hanging fruit — old sites in which cleanup work was essentially finished during former President Barack Obama’s administration.”
